show_category.info: First Article tag will be shown as its category

show_rating.label: Add Product Rating

enable_dynamic_checkout.label: Enable Dynamic Checkout Buttons
enable_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

custom_content.label: Liquid
custom_content.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.
